I'm a 40-smth Danish guy living in Copenhagen. I post about Danish and English-language/Int'l topics. I'm into political-economic history, natural sciences, engineering, philosophy & psychology, old-school tech & gaming and dark humor (a necessary spice of life 🤪).

NB! I occasionally post in high-volume whenever there is a lot of good/important/funny stuff around. 😊

Views expressed here are those of Galactic Emperor Xenu. 🐸
